front.title: Ethernet Service Type for Layer Two Tunneling Protocol

abstract.t: The Layer Two Tunneling Protocol (L2TP) [RFC2661] provides a standard method for tunneling PPP [RFC1661] packets. In accordance with the Layer Two Tunneling Protocol (L2TP) Service Type draft [L2TP_svctype], this document describes the details for transporting Ethernet frames over a session in an L2TP tunnel. That is, the details of an Ethernet service type for L2TP sessions.
